Marco Schneekluth
Welcome To My Personal Website

I am a developer, content creator and consultant based in Hamburg, Germany. On this site you can find some projects I am involved in. If you want to get in touch with me just check out my Linkedin, Xing profile or send me an email.

Here are some projects I've worked on:

  • Kryptokenner.de
    A blog/website about usage and investing in cryptocurrency.
  • Augenblicke-Online
    A photography wordpress website. Creating of an indiviual WP theme.
  • Meinarbeitszimmer.com
    An info page for home office products Under development
  • Pupusa.de
    A site to promote the pupusa, the traditional dish of El Salvador. Under development

About me

I am interested in the fields of web tracking, web development, cryptocurrencies and fintech. Apart from that, I like to play football in my spare time. I am always looking for a good web-based project to strengthen my skills in this field.
